description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Juventus vs Hellas Verona in the Serie A
title: Juventus vs Hellas Verona: Serie A stats & head-to-head
title_page: Juventus vs Hellas Verona: Serie A stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Goal!
Goal! Juventus 2, Verona 0. Teun Koopmeiners (Juventus) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Samuel Mbangula following a fast break.
Post
Attempt saved. Manuel Locatelli (Juventus) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Dusan Vlahovic.
Post
Attempt blocked. Manuel Locatelli (Juventus) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
